name: Clean Your Ocean
description:
Mr. Fish enjoyed his life in the ocean. One day while swimming out he realized how much trash there is. All trash the dumb humans produced and threw into the sea.

It is time for revenge. He decides to fill all the fishing baskets he usually avoids with the garbage.

Help Mr. Fish cleaning his ocean and remember when it's about trash and garbage: Less is more. Be mindful.

---

This game was developed during the seven days Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3.
